ProductInfo.Features:
4 CH Video Input Stand Alone CIF/HD1/D1 Resolution H.264 Compression Triplex Real Time Digital Video Recorder Industrial DVR
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function, live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
2 high resolution color SONY CCD DSP CCTV dome security camera
Package included: Digital Video Recorder, DVR Remote Control, DVR Power Supply, User Manual and Software CD, USB Mouse, 1.5TB Hard Drive. 4 Pack 50 Feet Security Camera Wire. 4 Color CCD Security Cameras. 4 Channel Camera Power Supply
